### Intergenic length distribution

```{r intergenic_lengths_table, results='asis'}
intergenic_regions <- get_intergenic_lengths(gff)

# Table 5: Intergenic region lengths
df <- data.frame(length=c(min(intergenic_lengths), mean(intergenic_lengths),
                         median(intergenic_lengths), max(intergenic_lengths)))
rownames(df) <- c('min', 'mean', 'median', 'max')
kable(t(df), caption='**Table 5** Intergenic length statistics.')
```

```{r intergenic_lengths_dist, fig.cap='**Figure 4**: Distribution of intergenic lengths'}
plot(density(intergenic_lengths), main='Distribution of intergenic lengths')
```
